dmca.title: DMCA Complaint from NetEnforcers Sony bajangles.com0047
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Jayme Williams [mailto:jayme@netenforcers.com] 
Posted At: Wednesday, June 14, 2006 6:47 AM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: DMCA Complaint from NetEnforcers Sony bajangles.com0047
Subject: RE: DMCA Complaint from NetEnforcers Sony bajangles.com0047


To Whom It May Concern:,
Thank you for removing all of Sony logos and copyrighted images from the
urls provided, but in order to comply fully all of the copyrighted
images and/or trademarked logos of Sony needs to be removed from your
entire website. This case will remain open until this request is
satisfied in full.  If you should need any further assistance in
reaching compliance please let me know and I will do my best to provide
you with the needed information.  
Thanks in advance for your attention to this matter. Please find the
below remaining URLs that are still in violation. 

http://bajangles.com/viewitem.php?IndexID=16490&RefTag=&itemTab=&model=
http://bajangles.com/viewitem.php?IndexID=16383&RefTag=&itemTab=&model=
http://bajangles.com/viewitem.php?IndexID=16383&RefTag=&itemTab=&model=
http://bajangles.com/viewitem.php?IndexID=16490&RefTag=&itemTab=&model=
http://bajangles.com/viewitem.php?IndexID=17394&RefTag=&itemTab=&model=
http://bajangles.com/viewitem.php?IndexID=16474&RefTag=&itemTab=&model=
http://bajangles.com/viewitem.php?IndexID=16487&RefTag=&itemTab=&model=
http://bajangles.com/viewitem.php?IndexID=16483&RefTag=&itemTab=&model=
http://bajangles.com/viewitem.php?IndexID=16479&RefTag=&itemTab=&model=
http://bajangles.com/viewitem.php?IndexID=16476&RefTag=&itemTab=&model=
http://bajangles.com/viewitem.php?IndexID=17255&RefTag=&itemTab=&model=
http://bajangles.com/viewitem.php?IndexID=16485&RefTag=&itemTab=&model=
http://bajangles.com/viewitem.php?IndexID=16383&RefTag=&itemTab=&model=
http://bajangles.com/viewitem.php?IndexID=17253&RefTag=&itemTab=&model=
http://bajangles.com/viewitem.php?IndexID=17394&RefTag=&itemTab=&model=
http://bajangles.com/viewitem.php?IndexID=17206&RefTag=&itemTab=&model=
http://bajangles.com/viewitem.php?IndexID=16470&RefTag=&itemTab=&model=



Jayme W

LMS Associate

Net Enforcers, Inc.

jayme@netenforcers.com

compliance.management@netenforcers.com

The Online Enforcement Experts...... 
Statement of Confidentiality

The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential
and are intended solely for the addressee. The information may also be
legally privileged. This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole
purpose of delivery to the intended recipient. If you have received this
transmission in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of this
transmission is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended
recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail and
delete this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.


-----Original Message-----
From: legal-response@theplanet.com [mailto:legal-response@theplanet.com]

Sent: Friday, June 02, 2006 12:22 PM
To: Jayme Williams; Stephany Santos; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA Complaint from NetEnforcers Sony bajangles.com0047

To Whom It May Concern:



This letter confirms that access to the materials referenced in your
below-pasted complaint has been disabled.



Legal Response Team

The Planet




---------


From: Santos, Stephany [mailto:stephany@netenforcers.com] 

Posted At: Thursday, May 25, 2006 10:48 AM

Posted To: Copyright

Conversation: bajangles.com-Sony Mobile Letter to ISP (02 14 06)

Subject: bajangles.com-Sony Mobile Letter to ISP (02 14 06)





DMCA Notifiaction-please respond to jayme@netenforcers.com 

------------------------------------------------------------------------
--------



 



Phoenix Office:



Ellis & Venable

101 N. First Avenue, Suite 1875



Phoenix, Arizona 85003 voice: (602) 631-9393



fax: (602) 631-9796



 

 

May 25, 2006

  



7006 0810 0005 4495 0047 



 



 



Designated Agent



The Planet.com



1333 N Stemmons Fwy



Ste 110



Dallas TX 75207



 



Re:      Unauthorized Use of Sony Trademarks and/or Copyrighted
Materials 



 



Dear Designated Agent:



            



We have been retained by our client, Net Enforcers, Inc., to contact you
with respect to unauthorized use of Sonys trademarks and/or copyrighted
materials.  



 



Sony has retained Net Enforcers to assist with the protection and
enforcement of its rights in Sony-owned or licensed trademarks, logos,
and other copyrighted materials.  Net Enforcers has in turn retained us
to assist with this matter.  Pursuant to 17 U.S.C. ' 512 (c)(3)(A), we
hereby notify you of Sonys good faith belief that your client,
bajangles.com at the URL www.bajangles.com, is using Sony trademarks
and/or copyrighted materials without authorization by Sony, its agents,
or the law, specifically with respect to mobile/car
audio/video/navigation products sold by Sonys Personal Mobile Imaging
Division.  Sony has a good faith belief that the information contained
in this letter is accurate.



 



            The specific works, graphics or other material Sony believes
to be infringed or to be the subject of infringing activity (the
Infringing Material) are copyrighted images from Sonys website.
Specific violations of copyrighted images by bajangles.com are listed
below this paragraph.



 



http://www.bajangles.com/viewitem.php?IndexID=16603&RefTag=&itemTab=&mod
el=



 



http://www.bajangles.com/viewitem.php?IndexID=16582&RefTag=&itemTab=&mod
el=



 



 



            Therefore, pursuant to the requirements of 17 U.S.C. '
512(c)(1)(C), Sony hereby demands that you remove or disable access to
the Infringing Material in an expeditious manner.  



 



If you have questions, please contact Net Enforcers Compliance
Management Department via facsimile to 501-646-6242, or via email to
Compliance.Management@NetEnforcers.com.  All communications should be in
writing.  However, if you wish to speak with Net Enforcers directly, you
may contact them at 501-646-6242.  Sony has authorized Net Enforcers to
handle and resolve this matter with you.  Please do not contact Sony
directly, as Sony will simply refer the matter back to Net Enforcers.
If your designated agent or representation does not respond to this
demand as requested by 5:00 p.m. on June 5, 2006, we will assume that
this demand has been rejected and proceed accordingly.



 



Sincerely,



Ellis & Venable







Lance C. Venable



Attorney at Law



 



LCV/roc



 



 



cc: Net Enforcers, Inc.
